text: "Car Wash" is a 1976 jazz song by Rose Royce. It was made for the 1976 movie of the same name. ==Christina Aguilera and Missy Elliott cover (2004)== Christina Aguilera and Missy Elliott have recorded a cover of the song for the 2004 DreamWorks Animation movie Shark Tale. It was reworked with additional lyrics relating to the movie and to fit Aguilera's vocal range. ==Reception== Car Wash is considered one of the best Disco songs of the 1970's. ==Other media== The song was used in the cold opening of the Futurama season 1 episode My Three Suns, where Bender goes through the Bot Wash and sings along to this song. Category:1976 songs Category:Christina Aguilera songs Category:Missy Elliott songs
title: Car Wash (song)
